items.sentence: You have no idea how tired I am of all this complaining.
Some people think the government has way too much power.
Tom isn't available at the moment. May I take a message?
Tom has been living in Boston for the past three months.
Let's not stay at the same hotel we stayed at last time.
Let's go somewhere a little bit quieter, so we can talk.
Grandad has boarded up the hole in the side of the shed.
You should've heeded my warning when you had the chance.
I have to ask you to do something that may be dangerous.
Tom apologized for the inconvenience he had caused Mary.
